channel.title: Halo On Windows XP FOR FREE
channel.description:
I really don't feel like paying for anything, because I am on allowance lock, and I am broke.
Is there any way I can play Halo on Windows XP for free?
EDIT: I would like Halo Combat Evolved, the first one that came out.

item.title: Halo On Windows XP FOR FREE
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Thanks for the suggestions guys, I’ll try them and if this gets bumped I’ll post with my results

Read full topic
item.source: Halo On Windows XP FOR FREE

item.title: Halo On Windows XP FOR FREE
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:7, topic:382160”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=477961.msg3497677#msg3497677 date=1297470374]
just get Halo Custom Edition, i have it, its awesome, though you would have to download maps etc on halomaps.org, including the single player maps, but you could get customized single player maps with h3 stuff etc…

But trust me, its 100x better, and you can get it for free, just look it up on youtube.
[/quote]

Well I’ll be damned, there actually is a free (and legal) download for it:
http://hce.halomaps.org/index.cfm?fid=410

The only catch is you must have a valid serial number for the original game, but, unless they have patched it since then, I used to use all zeros (00000000000000) for the key code back when the game first came out and it accepted it as a valid number, so I’d try that.[/quote]

But thats not all, thats the first step

Then you need to replace one of the files (forgot which one) so a cd rom isnt required to play it, then you need to install the update, do that again, fixing alot of bugs when playing online

I currently have it, and its awesome.

Read full topic
item.source: Halo On Windows XP FOR FREE

item.title: Halo On Windows XP FOR FREE
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:6, topic:382160”]just get Halo Custom Edition, i have it, its awesome, though you would have to download maps etc on halomaps.org, including the single player maps, but you could get customized single player maps with h3 stuff etc…

But trust me, its 100x better, and you can get it for free, just look it up on youtube.[/quote]

Well I’ll be damned, there actually is a free (and legal) download for it:
http://hce.halomaps.org/index.cfm?fid=410

The only catch is you must have a valid serial number for the original game, but, unless they have patched it since then, I used to use all zeros (00000000000000) for the key code back when the game first came out and it accepted it as a valid number, so I’d try that.

Read full topic
